control.name: gridControl1
control.description: The CustomUnboundColumnData event is handled to provide data for and to save modified data from unbound columns. The data provided for unbound columns is represented by a custom data source (the Record object). The "Full Name" column isn't assigned to any data field in a bound data source, it displays custom read-only information which is obtained from the values in the bound "First Name" and "Last Name" columns. The CustomColumnDisplayText event is handled for this purpose.
